https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ypnLRUuBiu6VxQAiYeBvmLrR4fL.jpg Sameer is the archetypal struggler who leaves his dad in Delhi and comes to Mumbai, chasing dreams of becoming a star in Bollywood. Does he manage to survive the bleak and grueling rounds of endless auditions, broken promises and missed chances? Chance Pe Dance
